betterquesting.desc: Want some ram wafers? Buy some!

betterquesting.name: Integrated Logic Circuit Wafer
betterquesting.desc: Want some integrated logic circuit wafers? Buy some!

betterquesting.name: Oil
betterquesting.desc: Want some oil? Buy some!

betterquesting.name: Creosote Oil
betterquesting.desc: Want some creosote oil? Buy some!

betterquesting.name: Diesel
betterquesting.desc: Want some diesel? Buy some!

betterquesting.name: Methane
betterquesting.desc: Want some methane? Buy some!

betterquesting.name: Bio Diesel
betterquesting.desc: Want some bio diesel? Buy some!

betterquesting.name: Oxygen
betterquesting.desc: Want some oxygen? Buy some!

betterquesting.name: Nitrogen
betterquesting.desc: Want some nitrogen? Buy some!

betterquesting.name: Hydrogen
betterquesting.desc: Want some hydrogen? Buy some!

betterquesting.name: Glue
betterquesting.desc: Want some glue? Buy some!

betterquesting.name: Lubricant
betterquesting.desc: Want some lubricant? Buy some!

betterquesting.name: Glycerol
betterquesting.desc: Want some glycerol? Buy some!

betterquesting.name: Cetan-Boosted Fuel
betterquesting.desc: Want some cetan-boosted fuel? Buy some!

betterquesting.name: Silverwood Sapling
betterquesting.desc: Silverwood saplings are always rare to find. Want some? Buy some!

betterquesting.name: Time to kill (Ghast)
betterquesting.desc: They shoot you with explosive fireballs but they are weak when you hit them or throw the fireballs back. Better upgrade your armor with fire and blast protection.

betterquesting.name: Is this the End? No the END Dimension
betterquesting.desc:
Your investigation into the pearls has shown you that the source of the disturbance seems to be coming out of the shimmering portals inside strongholds. You feel strangely drawn into its mysterious depths.

Hint: throwing Ender Eyes in the air in the Overworld will guide you to the nearest stronghold . From time to time Ender Eyes are destroyed in this progress.

betterquesting.name: Upgraded RF Batteries
betterquesting.desc: Capacitor Banks are upgraded RF batteries which can store the RF power you generate. You can put many blocks together to enlarge your total battery capacity.

betterquesting.name: Vibrant Capacitor Banks
betterquesting.desc: The Vibrant Capacitor Bank is the largest RF Battery for now. It can store 25 million RF in a single block. Putting many capacitor banks together will enlarge your total battery capacity.

betterquesting.name: Vibrant alloy
betterquesting.desc: Vibrant alloy is a high tier EnderIO alloy made out of ender eye, energetic alloy and chrome dust. 3600k heating coils and a vacuum freezer are needed to make ingots.

betterquesting.name: Energetic Alloy
betterquesting.desc: Energetic alloy is a new alloy from EnderIO made out of gold, conductive iron and black steel dust. Double-layer capacitors need it and it can be made in the  electric blast furnace with tier 2 coils (2700K).

betterquesting.name: Dark Steel Armor basic upgrades
betterquesting.desc: In order to upgrade one armor item with basic upgrades, you need a vibrant crystal and 10 xp levels.

betterquesting.name: Go find some tropical bees
betterquesting.desc: Next you will need to find some tropical bees. The hives can be found in Jungle biomes. Be careful as these bees are very agressive and can poison you. Collect the silky combs and extract some silk wisp from those in order to make some Apiarist's clothes.

betterquesting.name: Silky combs and Propolis
betterquesting.desc:
Collect silky combs and extract some silk wisp out of it in order to make some Apiarist's clothes.
This can take quite a bit of time.
Use a Gretech or Forestry Centrifuge to get Silky Propolis.

betterquesting.name: The Centrifuge
betterquesting.desc: The Forestry Centrifuge is able to centrifuge up to 9 items out of bee combs. It uses RF energy.

betterquesting.name: Woven silk
betterquesting.desc:
Centrifuge your silky propolis to get some silk wisp at a chance of 60%. Put 9 silk wisp in the Forestry carpenter or Gregtech assembler to get woven silk. 
This fine fabric can be used for crafting Apiarist's Clothes or to upgrade your Forestry Backpacks to 45 slots.

betterquesting.name: Apiarist's Cloth
betterquesting.desc: If you have collected 24 woven silk you can make a complete Apiarist's suit to be protected from bee stings and other bad bee effects. You can also use the suit parts to upgrade your EnderIO Dark Steel Armor.

betterquesting.name: Dark Steel Armor advanced upgrades
betterquesting.desc: Your Dark Steel armor can be upgraded in various ways by combining it with various other items. You will need an anvil and a lot of XP.

betterquesting.name: Dark Steel Tool and Weapon basic upgrades
betterquesting.desc: In order to upgrade a weapon or tool, you need a vibrant crystal and 10 xp levels.

betterquesting.name: Dark Steel Tool and Weapon advanced upgrades
betterquesting.desc: Your weapons and tools can be upgraded even more by adding capacitors and various other items.

betterquesting.name: RF Solar Panel
betterquesting.desc: It is possible to power RF machines with a solar panel. It outputs 10 RF/t.

betterquesting.name: RF Solar Panel Tier 2
betterquesting.desc: The upgraded RF solar panel is much better. It outputs 40 RF/t.

betterquesting.name: Enchanted Earth
betterquesting.desc: Enchanted Earth makes saplings and seeds planted on it grow faster. When stacked on top of each other it has a chance to add ticks to the block above accumulating all the way to the top. This will randomly speed up growth a bit.

betterquesting.name: Power of the Sun at MV Level
betterquesting.desc: Next  solarpanel you can make is the MV one. It gives 128 EU/t max. Most gt machine can use them as covers. First you need to produce sunnarium out of 9 smaller sunnarium pieces.

betterquesting.name: Power of the Sun 1x1 MV
betterquesting.desc: Put those 128 eu panels on a block make them placeable in the world. Use an HV assembler to combine the panel with an MV hull.

betterquesting.name: Indium
betterquesting.desc:
At EV Level you are able to make Indium for HV Solar Panels. Indium can not be found in Ore form. It can only be made with an ev chemical reactor.
First you need to make indium out of purified galena and sphalherite ore. Mix in some aluminium to get indium.

betterquesting.name: Power of the Sun at HV Level
betterquesting.desc: The next solarpanel you can make is the HV one. It generates 512 EU/t max. Most gt machine can use them as covers. First you need to produce enriched sunnarium by mixing irridiant uranium and sunnarium. The Avaritia 9x9 crafting table is required to make this panel.

betterquesting.name: Power of the Sun 1x1 HV
betterquesting.desc: Put those 512 eu panels on a block to make them placeable in the world. Use an MV assembler to combine the panel with an HV hull.

betterquesting.name: Books
betterquesting.desc:
Books can be found easily enough in villages or in the roguelike dungeons surface brick house.
I'm sure they have a recipe too.

betterquesting.name: Fish trapping 2.0
betterquesting.desc:
Fishing can be very boring. Why not automate it with a fish trap?
This is your fish trap 2.0

betterquesting.name: Fresh Water and Milk
betterquesting.desc:
Many cooking recipes need milk and water. Crafting it in the crafting table can be very tedious.
It is much easier by using a Forestry worktable. Drag-click all your buckets into the worktable, and craft them all at once.

betterquesting.name: Find Bauxite
betterquesting.desc:
The main goal when you reach the Moon is to find some bauxite ore to make titanium for the EV machine tier. Some meteoric iron will help to build your tier 2 rocket for reaching Mars.

If you lucky you will find Titanium veins too make the process much more easy.

betterquesting.name: Rutile
betterquesting.desc:
Rutile can be thermal centrifuged out of bauxite and ilmenite dust. 
Electrolyzing bauxite can extract even more rutile and putting ilmenite in the electric blast furnace can give some rutile too.

betterquesting.name: SMD Circuit components
betterquesting.desc: Surface-mount devices are more advanced circuits parts. They are needed for high tier circuits and are cheaper to craft than basic capacitors, transitors, diodes and resistors. You need an Advanced Assembler and some molten polyethylen.

betterquesting.name: Workstation Extreme Curcuit
betterquesting.desc: The next tier of circuits are the extreme circuits. Workstation Circuits are the easiest one and are needed in EV Tier. Let's craft some.

betterquesting.name: Empty Plastic Board
betterquesting.desc: Plastic circuit boards require plastic Plate with Sulfuric Acid to make an Empty Board. By adding copper foil and Iron3Chloride or Sodium Persulfate you can craft a plastic circuit board.

betterquesting.name: Integrated Processor
betterquesting.desc:
There are three variants of good circuits. The good electronic circuit, the good integrated circuit and the integrated processor which needs an MV circuit assembling machine to be made. The integrated processor needs a cpu, capacitors, transistors and resistors.
A cleanroom is needed.

betterquesting.name: Processor Assembly
betterquesting.desc:
Another variant of the advanced circuit from ic2 is the processing assembly.
Two Integrated Processors are needed in the MV circuit assembler recipe.
The recipe is a cleanroom recipe.

betterquesting.name: Central Processing Unit CPU
betterquesting.desc:
Integrated Processors need central processing units. You can get these by cutting a ram wafer.
A cleanroom is needed.

betterquesting.name: Small Coil
betterquesting.desc: Processing assembly needs some small coils.

betterquesting.name: Iron III Chloride
betterquesting.desc:
Iron 3 chloride can be made by first making hydrochloric acid out of hydrogen and chlorine. Then combine this with some iron dust to make iron 3 chloride.
You can etch your board with it.

betterquesting.name: Sodium Persulfate
betterquesting.desc:
Sodium Persulfate can be made in the chemical reactor out of sodium, sulfur and water.
You can etch your board with it.

betterquesting.name: Motor MV
betterquesting.desc: Want some MV motors? Buy some!

betterquesting.desc: Want some MV conveyor belts? Buy some!

betterquesting.desc: Want some central processing unit wafers? Buy some!

betterquesting.desc: Want some Plastic Sheet? Buy some!

betterquesting.desc: Want some chlorine? Buy some!

betterquesting.desc: Want some iron 3 chloride? Buy some!

betterquesting.name: Sodium Persulfate
betterquesting.desc: Want some sodium persulfate? Buy some!

betterquesting.name: Pyrochlore Ore
betterquesting.desc: Can't find Pyrochlore ore because run an old worldgen? Buy some Ores.

betterquesting.name: Forest Hive
betterquesting.desc: Want some Forest Bees? Buy some!

betterquesting.name: Deep Hive
betterquesting.desc: Want some Attuned Bees? Buy some!

betterquesting.name: Ender Hive
betterquesting.desc: Want some Ender Bees? Buy some!

betterquesting.name: Bees House
betterquesting.desc: Want some bees house? Buy some!

betterquesting.name: Apiary
betterquesting.desc: Want some Apiary? Buy some!

betterquesting.name: Proven Frames
betterquesting.desc: Want some proven frames? Buy some!

betterquesting.name: Infernal Hive
betterquesting.desc: Want some Infernal Bees? Buy some!

betterquesting.name: Oblivion Hive
betterquesting.desc: Want some Oblivion Bees? Buy some!

betterquesting.name: Did you want to know your warp level?
betterquesting.desc:
After a few forbidden researches your warp level are increased a bit. Did you want to know how much warp you have?
Craft some litmus paper to print out the warp.

betterquesting.name: Meadow Hive
betterquesting.desc: Want some Meadows Bees? Buy some!

betterquesting.name: Modest Hive
betterquesting.desc: Want some Modest Bees? Buy some!

betterquesting.name: Tropical Hive
betterquesting.desc: Want some Forest Bees? Buy some!

betterquesting.name: Wintry Hive
betterquesting.desc: Want some Wintry Bees? Buy some!

betterquesting.name: Marshy Hive
betterquesting.desc: Want some Marshy Bees? Buy some!

betterquesting.name: Water Hive
betterquesting.desc: Want some Water Bees? Buy some!

betterquesting.name: Rocky Hive
betterquesting.desc: Want some Rocky Bees? Buy some!

betterquesting.name: Nether Hive
betterquesting.desc: Want some Embittered Bees? Buy some!

betterquesting.name: Curious Hive
betterquesting.desc: Want some Mystical Bees? Buy some!

betterquesting.name: Unusual Hive
betterquesting.desc: Want some Unusual Bees? Buy some!

betterquesting.name: Resonating Hive
betterquesting.desc: Want some Sorcerous Bees? Buy some!

betterquesting.name: Space Station
betterquesting.desc:
If you dont have some Space station yet?
You can add up to four spin truster to your station to rotate it.

Days on space staions longer then on the overworld so you can generated more power from solar.

betterquesting.name: Are you prepared?
betterquesting.desc:
Are you prepared for the Moon?
A few things will help you to live longer or beware you of death on the Moon.
If you died on the moon you will be retured to earth without your stuff. Grave are left on the location you died.

betterquesting.name: Oak, Spruce, Brich, Jungle Sapling
betterquesting.desc: You spawn in a dessert and need Oak saplings or Birch ones? No problem for five Forestry Coins you can select which one you want to buy.

betterquesting.name: Magic Feather
betterquesting.desc:
Lets craft some magical Map focus to create a magical map and find Twilight Monster Bosses a bit more easy.
Go find some Raven feather. You can get them by killing Raven sitting on Obsidian Blocks in Twilight. Then you need some Torcheberrys and at least Glowstone dust.

betterquesting.name: Magic Map
betterquesting.desc: For the Magic map you need the magic map focus and a stack of Paper. Please using the map only in twilight forest you can get every 24h a new map so be careful with it. Using the map in the Overworld or another dimension will lag the server.

betterquesting.name: Moon arrival
betterquesting.desc: I have a small present for you: a Talisman of Remedium very usefull to persevere the dark nights with all this Monsters.

betterquesting.name: Naga

betterquesting.desc: Double Aluminium Plates are quite expensive but worth to make it for your Tool Forge. Using your new Mv Bender to make some.

betterquesting.name: Tier 0 - It begins
betterquesting.desc: The very first tier, tier zero. This chapter will introduce you to the basic mechanics of this modpack. Mods covered: Vanilla, Pam's Harvestcraft.

betterquesting.name: Tier 0.5 - Stone Age
betterquesting.desc: Basically the "Tier 0" of all your progression. This set helps you through the first tier until you can build your first steam machine

betterquesting.name: Tier 1 - Steam
betterquesting.desc: Quest set for all steam-based machines.

betterquesting.name: Tier 2 - 32 EU (LV)
betterquesting.desc: The first "voltage" tier of this pack. Things are getting easier...

betterquesting.name: Tier 3 - 128 EU (MV)
betterquesting.desc: Your second voltage tier. Don't mix different voltage levels, or you will be punished in a hard way.

betterquesting.name: Tier 4 - 512 EU (HV)
betterquesting.desc: Finally some power to work with. This tier will help you reach distant planets and gather more rare resources to build even more advanced machines.

betterquesting.name: Tier 5 - 2048 EU (EV)
betterquesting.desc: Titanium level, fissile energy sources, Applied Energistics 2.

betterquesting.name: Tier 6 and beyond
betterquesting.desc: The last regular tier that will "guide" you

betterquesting.name: Coins, Coins, Coins
betterquesting.desc: These quests will guide you to use your Coins wisely and buy some useful or fancy stuff.

betterquesting.name: Forestry and Farms
betterquesting.desc: Automated Farms and more.....

betterquesting.name: Steve Carts
betterquesting.desc: Auto farming and mining

betterquesting.name: Novice Thaumaturge
betterquesting.desc: Magic lies beyond. Great achievements, but also a lot of work. I shall be your guide. Follow my instructions, and you shall become a great wizard, like me.

betterquesting.name: Adept Thaumaturgy
betterquesting.desc: Warp included.

betterquesting.name: Kaaami, Haaaami, ... HA!
betterquesting.desc: Ultimate (magical) POWER!!!

betterquesting.name: Alternative Magic
betterquesting.desc: What kind of witchery is this!?

betterquesting.name: Multiblock Goals
betterquesting.desc: This set is a global tracker for multiblock structure goals. As you can build several parts of many multiblocks way earlier than the respective tier.

betterquesting.name: Armors and Jetpacks
betterquesting.desc: Guiding you through the armor and jetpacks.

betterquesting.name: Cooking Farming Fishing
betterquesting.desc: Cooking basic and more advanced food

betterquesting.name: Transportation
betterquesting.desc: All kinds of transportation means

betterquesting.name: Space Race
betterquesting.desc: A guide to help you start Galacticraft and reach the Moon

betterquesting.name: Legendary Quests
betterquesting.desc: A legendary quest-line with difficult tasks, expensive recipes and potentially dangerous locations. Are you prepared?

betterquesting.name: Legendary Tier X
betterquesting.desc: A legendary quest-line with difficult tasks, expensive recipes and potentially dangerous locations. Are you prepared?

betterquesting.name: Legendary Infinity
betterquesting.desc: A legendary questline with difficult tasks, expensive recipes and potentially dangerous locations. Are you prepared?

betterquesting.name: Paying the highest price
betterquesting.desc: When regular magic just won't cover it, pay demons to do it for you! The cost might scare some people... But no risk no fun!

betterquesting.name: More blood, more stuff
betterquesting.desc: Advanced Blood Magic? My veins feel weird...

betterquesting.name: They are coming...
betterquesting.desc: The spirits that I've called... Demon invasions and beyond. Really deep into dark magic!

betterquesting.name: Kill all the things
betterquesting.desc: This world is full of nasty things. Time to kill some and improve your reputation.

betterquesting.name: How to be(e)
betterquesting.desc: A non-tiered quest set that is meant as an in game, quest based tutorial and guide to bees. Since they are a really helpful tool to advance forward.

betterquesting.name: To grind, or not to grind
betterquesting.desc: That is the question. Do you want good tools? Well, then go grind stuff! The rewards of these quests are worth it, trust me.

betterquesting.desc: Upgrade your loot bags!
